pr_title: Fix of creating application in VSUP registrar module

timeline.message:
Fix of creating application in VSUP registrar module

- merging of new application with user already in perun based on birth number in VSUP module now has to be approved manually by vo admin
- at the end of approval of application the user external source is created based on RC for future merging of the user

timeline.bodyText: This would create ExtSource with name RC and type as value of birthNumber. At VŠUP type of RC ExtSource is INTERNAL, we should have constant for it somewhere.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText:
You shouldn't pass identity from application into the RC UserExtSource. It should contain login from the rc, like
new UserExtSource(es, 0, rc));
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: Message will contain toString() from the User object, which is not most user friendly way. I would prefer printing just displayName and ID.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Fixes based on review

- user in message changed to just displayName and id
- fixed creation of RC ues

timeline.bodyText:
Are you sure this should react to any exception? Because if there will be for example "InternalErrorException", this will say that the application can be approved if I understand it right.
@zlamalp should it work this way?
timeline.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: You are right, that we should fail at least on InternalErrorException and ExtSourceNotExistsException. Generally we should catch and ignore only safe exceptions thrown by the getUserByExtSourceNameAndExtLogin()
replies.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: Ok, I've change the catched exception only to those that are thrown by getUserByExtSourceNameAndExtLogin().
replies.author: metodej

timeline.author: zlamalp
zlamalp

replies.bodyText: Okay, thank you for comment, I've added this check and also the mentioned method.
replies.author: metodej

timeline.message:
Fixes based on review

- corrected exceptions catch in canBeApproved
- fixed case when user is already member (and created method updateApplicationType in RegistrarManager)

timeline.bodyText: Isn't here the app.getUser() always null? This should probably be located elsewhere.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

replies.bodyText: Yes, it should have been in the other branch of if, thank you.
replies.author: metodej

timeline.message:
Fixes based on review

- fix in case that user is already member moved to the right location

timeline.bodyText: Must be application.getType().toString() otherwise jdbc driver cannot guess the type: Can't infer the SQL type to use for an instance of cz.metacentrum.perun.registrar.model.Application$AppType.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Fixes based on review

- fix of input of apptype in updateApplicationType
